pageTitle: Public events for December 18, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, December 18, 2015:

Montréal

11:00 a.m. – The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire-Trudeau visit Moisson Montréal to make Christmas baskets with volunteers.

Moisson Montréal
6880 De la Côte de Liesse Road
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Media should contact Moisson Montréal at acarpentier@moissonmontreal.org for accreditation

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
